If you enjoy solving puzzles in here I think you'd enjoy doing puzzle hunts online
a beginner puzzle  hunt website https://puzzledpint.com/
this game is already not for the weakhearted, its actually quite a difficult game. the secrets are not the typical ‚Äúno shit sherlock‚Äù puzzles
some of the puzzles and secrets here are heavily inspired by one of the creator's favorite games, la-mulana, and that game is filled with very cryptic and unusual puzzles to progress through it
la mulana is not even as out there as some of these tho
puzzle hunts rarely use complicated cyphers
sometimes the hints the game gives you are puzzles to be solved on their own honestly lol
theres so many steps to some of them that it gets kinda crazy
if they use a cypher then they'll always hint at which one to use
it also never really requires outsider information
ARGs really leave you with 0 info
puzzle hunts are MEANT to be solved
or outside info yeah
its not an observational puzzle but its a state of mind replication of the creator
